channel.title: Riot Vanguard on AVX's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Riot Vanguard on AVX's Blog

item.title: Defeating Vanguard's Import Protection
item.description: Introduction Being a fiercely competitive game, Valorant must demand no cheats and demands ongoing attention and devotion to keep cheaters at bay. Vangaurd, the barrier between heroes and cheaters, has been actively developing new strategies to hinder an attacker’s capacity to study the game and cheat. To shield the module from static analysis, Vanguard’s kernel component, vgk, uses an import protection method to protect important imports from prying eyes. Exploration In contrast to the previous article, Vanguard locates the necessary imports using dedicated resolving functions.
